front.title: Locator/ID Separation Protocol (LISP): Shared Extension Message & IANA Registry for Packet Type Allocations

abstract.t: This document specifies a Locator/ID Separation Protocol (LISP) shared message type for defining future extensions and conducting experiments without consuming a LISP packet type codepoint for each extension. It also defines a registry for LISP Packet Type allocations, thus updating RFC 6830.
